attributes.action: New National Day for the Bristh Isles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A national Day is needed to celebrate
modern Britian and its diffrent culture
and ideas like Australia day.
Britian is a modern nation and needs a national day as a holiday where people
can join with locals and nationally to celebrate and learn about Britian in 2008.
Be great idea to get people to focus on people around them in there street
and town/area on this day and meet and enjoy this day (many people dont know even who lives next door in modern Britian)
Also a celebration of the diffrent
cultures and new arrivals to the UK
please see http://www.australiaday.gov.au as an excellent idea

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
